S.FORM: alang Kukung ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Gpho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 25 buwan, 67 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 94 kyan ku 63 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 6 kyan ku 4 hi nya. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Kukung hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Kukung hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Kukung hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Kukung hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Kukung hya' ga Skaru. tay mkyahu' na Kukung hya' ga Ruba'. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
